ack.p: We appreciate all PLA medical teams who were deployed to Liberia and worked in the Chinese ETC for their efforts during the Ebola outbreak. We are especially grateful to those members who participated in this study.

sec.title: Funding
sec.p: This study was funded by the Seed Funding, Army Medical University (Third Military Medical University), China (2016XYY04) and Project from PLA (AWS17J014). The funders had no role in study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.

sec.title: Availability of data and materials
sec.p: Data sharing is not applicable to this article as no datasets were generated or analysed during the study.
